replies.msg:
Dear Students and Colleagues,

In light of the widespread turmoil in various parts of the city today and the resultant impact on public transportation services, both Chai Wan and Tsing Yi campuses of THEi, including the 24-hour studios/labs, will be closed tomorrow. All classes will be cancelled tomorrow and staff are not required to come to campus and may work from home.

This is a most difficult time for Hong Kong and our concern for the personal safety and well-being of our students and staff remains paramount. THEi will continue to communicate with and offer necessary assistance to students and/or staff in need. We call on all members of THEi community to support each other and to remain calm in the face of continuing uncertainty.

Professor Christina Hong

President

幫樓主補返中文版

In view of unforeseen traffic conditions, all classes/examinations of today and tomorrow (11—12 November 2019) offered by all member institutions of the Vocational Training Council (VTC) will be cancelled.

因應未能預計的交通情況，職業訓練局（VTC）所有院校今明兩日（2019年11月11日及12日）所有課堂/考試取消。
啱曬唔好畀佢停，一有被罷課個勢就黎料
